
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52983968">
<strong><i><font style="color:rgb(31, 41, 55)"><font face="Asap, sans-serif"><font size="3">苏斯博士英语</font></font></font><font face="Asap, sans-serif">启蒙</font></i></strong><font style="color:rgb(31, 41, 55)"><font face="Asap, sans-serif"><font size="3"><strong><i>经典动画《万事通戴帽子的猫 The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That (1-3季) 》</i></strong></font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_l2qre" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
<font style="color:rgb(31, 41, 55)"><font face="Asap, sans-serif"><font size="3">主要内容：一套非常适合4-9岁儿童观看的动画片，改编自世界儿童文学作家苏斯博士的名著《戴帽子的猫》，原著仅使用了236个单词，引起了巨大的反响，对儿童读本产生了重大影响。动画片继承了原著的探索自然的精神，并教导孩子们有关词汇和生活技巧等基本知识。</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_owpI6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
<font style="color:rgb(31, 41, 55)"><font face="Asap, sans-serif"><font size="3">百度云盘链接：</font></font></font><font style="color:rgb(68, 68, 68)"><font face="Asap, sans-serif">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1CDzDYXAhtZliYjzqhWCiUQ?pwd=1111</font></font></td></tr></tbody></table>
